mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_custom(menu_seq, menu_code, menu_writer, menu_title, menu_img, menu_option) VALUES( #{menu_seq}, #{menu_code}, #{menu_writer}, #{menu_title}, #{menu_img}, #{menu_option} )
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tbl_custom(menu_seq, menu_code, menu_writer, menu_title, menu_img, menu_option) VALUES( #{menu_seq}, #{menu_code}, #{menu_writer}, #{menu_title}, #{menu_img}, #{menu_option} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE menu_code=#{menu_code}, menu_writer=#{menu_writer}, menu_title=#{menu_title}, menu_img=#{menu_img}, menu_option=#{menu_option}

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_custom( menu_seq BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, menu_code BIGINT NOT NULL, menu_writer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, menu_title VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, menu_img VARCHAR(256), menu_option VARCHAR(256) )
